title: 98/146/EC: Commission Decision of 6 February 1998 concerning the importation of live animals of ovine and caprine species from Uruguay and amending Council Decision 79/542/EEC (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 6 February 1998 concerning the importation of live animals of ovine and caprine species from Uruguay and amending Council Decision 79/542/EEC (Text with EEA relevance) (98/146/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Part I of the Annex to Decision 79/542/EEC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 February 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ L 13, 16. 1. 1997, p. 26.
(3) OJ L 146, 14. 6. 1979, p. 15.
(4) OJ L 295, 29. 10. 1997, p. 37.
ANNEX
'Imports shall fulfil the appropriate animal and public health requirements.
